before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ecie","text":"H9 dCAS9 CRISPRi were transduced with the pooled CRISPRi library to  obtain the gDNA (genomic DNA) after lentiviral transduction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69o45","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3p2og","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Renuka Ravi Gupta, Nona Farbehi, hendersa, Vikram Khurana, Gist Croft, Lorenz Studer, Joseph Powell","can_edit":true,"date":0,"doi":"https://protocols.io/view/lentiviral-transduction-of-human-pluripotent-stem-c9wtz7en","guid":"459651B1354E4CCE9D0E1F1469CEACE1","id":0,"journal":"protocols.io","protocol_guid":"2F6F97C1F7EE4DDEBB4F1CF7F818C98E","title":"LENTIVIRAL TRANSDUCTION OF HUMAN PLURIPOTENT STEM CELLS"}}}}

cited_protocols.title: GENERATING THE POOLED SINGLE GUIDE RNA LIBRARIES

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"71qhn","text":"Quantification of the frequency of each sgRNA in the library pool is necessary before proceeding to the 10x Genomic assay. We prepare genomic DNA collected after lentiviral transduction of the CRISPR library in H9 dCAS9 cell line to verify the plasmid/viral pool for the CRISPR library via Next Generation Sequencing (NGS sequencing). Genomic DNA was extracted from cells of interest, PCR amplified and the final product was sent to the sequencing facility, where the downstream cleanup and sequencing was performed.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

references.title: LENTIVIRAL TRANSDUCTION OF HUMAN PLURIPOTENT STEM CELLS
references.authors: Renuka Ravi Gupta, Nona Farbehi, hendersa, Vikram Khurana, Gist Croft, Lorenz Studer, Joseph Powell

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hov3","text":"Collect cells after FACS sort in E8 flex media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1la83","text":"Centrifuge the cells at 300 g for 4 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbqmk","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and freeze down the cell pellet or continue with DNA extraction using the QIAamp DNA Blood Mini Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"comhq","text":"Measure the concentration of the DNA using nanodrop to check the  quality of the DNA and using Qubit to get the precise concentration of the DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39qgr","text":"PCR reactions are set up as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9oveg","text":"Template 50 ng pCRISPRi_dual guide gRNA library, 1:1 primers mU6 Fwd + RW704 illuSeq-Rev","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80if4","text":"Template 50 ng pCRISPRi_dual guide gRNA library, 1:1 primers LKO/U6 Fwd + RW705 illuSeq-Rev","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39eds","text":"Inorder to ensure enough yield of DNA product we load 50 ng of DNA/ reaction for the PCR amplification for each run and set up at least 4 PCR reactions which will be pooled to ensure even distribution of the sgRNAs.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd2e7","text":"  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2g2uc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u5f7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e83vi","text":"Detailed protocol for PCR sample preparation can be found in this link: https://rochesequencingstore.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/KAPA-HiFi-HotStart-ReadyMix-PCR-Kit-Technical-Data-Sheet_v14-22.pdf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":72,"length":127}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":72,"length":127}],"data":{}},{"key":"2c1oc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"formula":"Volume=50/conc","guid":"","id":0}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["92","92","183"],"data":[["REAGENT","1X IN uL","FINAL CONCENTRATION"],["2X KAPA HiFi HotStart Ready Mix","12.5","1X"],["10uM Fwd Primer","0.75","0.3uM"],["10uM Rev Primer","0.75","0.3uM"],["Template DNA (50ng)","As required","As required"],["PCR grade Water ","Up to 25uL","N/A"]],"guid":"EA27BEC107554E72B01C9D798309CBAD","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["REAGENT","1X in uL","FINAL CONCENTRATION"],["2X KAPA HiFi HotStart Ready Mix","12.5","1X"],["10uM Fwd Primer","0.75","0.3uM"],["10uM Rev Primer","0.75","0.3uM"],["Template DNA (50ng)","As required","As required"],["PCR grade Water ","Up to 25uL","N/A"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"02E506D1D69411EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://rochesequencingstore.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/KAPA-HiFi-HotStart-ReadyMix-PCR-Kit-Technical-Data-Sheet_v14-22.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tj9t","text":"Set up the thermal cycler using the following program: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nkod","text":"95ºC for 3 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6694p","text":"25 cycles of: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sq8u","text":"95ºC for 30 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4pl9","text":"95ºC for 30 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dft08","text":"95ºC for 30 seconds","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g7me","text":"72ºC for 5 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjsrg","text":"Hold at 4ºC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"essq","text":"Detailed protocol for PCR sample preparation can be found in this link: https://support.illumina.com/documents/documentation/chemistry_documentation/16s/16s-metagenomic-library-prep-guide-15044223-b.pdf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":72,"length":130}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":130}],"data":{}},{"key":"au6il","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3BD38382D69411EEB9800A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://support.illumina.com/documents/documentation/chemistry_documentation/16s/16s-metagenomic-library-prep-guide-15044223-b.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21ues","text":"Pool the PCR products with similar forward and reverse primers together and send them to the sequencing platform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1225v","text":"QC for the final product was done by the sequencing platform by running the agarose gel to verify  the required size of band followed by downstream sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
